changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE other_name ADD visibility VARCHAR(19)
ALTER TABLE other_name ADD source_id VARCHAR(19)
ALTER TABLE other_name ADD client_source_id VARCHAR(20)
ALTER TABLE other_name ADD CONSTRAINT other_name_source_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES profile(orcid)
ALTER TABLE other_name ADD CONSTRAINT other_name_client_source_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (client_source_id) REFERENCES client_details(client_details_id)

changeSet.author: Shobhit Tyagi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE other_name a SET visibility = (Select other_names_visibility from profile b where a.orcid = b.orcid) where a.visibility is null

UPDATE other_name a SET source_id = (Select orcid from profile b where a.orcid = b.orcid and b.claimed=true), client_source_id = (Select client_source_id from profile b where a.orcid = b.orcid and b.claimed=false) WHERE a.source_id is null and a.client_source_id is null
